name: The Blob Escape
description:
Join Catalina on an adventure to help save the Blobs!

Controls:

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

Featuring Tilesets and Sprites Created By:

  • MonkeyImage
  • Teaceratops
  • GibbonGL
  • MaterialFuture
  • Jeremy Oduber
  • DreamGryphon
  • wintonson
  • Rekkimaru

This was created using GB Studio.
